programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: AFC South supremacy is on the line when the Jaguars (8-4) host the Colts (8-4). Jacksonville has won three in a row to jump into the division fray. Indianapolis lost its last two games, at Kansas City and to Houston, by a combined seven points.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The AFC West-leading Broncos (10-2) line up against the rival Raiders (2-10). Denver ran its win streak to nine games with a 27-26 overtime win at Washington on Sunday night. Included in that stretch is a 10-7 win over Las Vegas in Week 10.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: Fresh off a massive divisional victory, the Texans try to further distance themselves from the Chiefs. Houston is riding a four-game win streak, one game up on Kansas City, and one game back of the AFC South lead after beating rival Indianapolis.

programme.title: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: The 2025 Formula One season comes down to a decisive Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. After winning in Qatar, four-time defending World Drivers' Champion Max Verstappen sits 12 points behind Lando Norris. Norris claims his first WDC title with a podium finish.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The AFC West-leading Broncos (10-2) line up against the rival Raiders (2-10). Denver ran its win streak to nine games with a 27-26 overtime win at Washington on Sunday night. Included in that stretch is a 10-7 win over Las Vegas in Week 10.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: Fresh off a massive divisional victory, the Texans try to further distance themselves from the Chiefs. Houston is riding a four-game win streak, one game up on Kansas City, and one game back of the AFC South lead after beating rival Indianapolis.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a crucial witness in the case of a fatal hate crime against a Muslim family is deported, Barba must drop the charges against a suspect, resulting in rising tensions between communities on either side of the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The release of a suspect in a hate crime case leaves Benson and Barba caught between two families seeking justice; as public protests escalate to violence, Benson goes to desperate lengths to make an arrest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an infant goes missing, members of the SVU find themselves taking sides in a family's right-to-die court case; Barba's interference in the case puts the entire DA's office in jeopardy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a sexual assault investigation is stalled for months, a woman puts her accusations against a popular athlete on a billboard.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Elliot Stabler puts his marriage at risk when he goes under cover to gain access to an animal-smuggling ring, with Olivia posing as a prostitute.

programme.desc: When two sniper attacks on the NYPD link to Detective Tutuola's past as a narcotics officer, he reconnects with his former partner in hope of finding a motive; Lt. Alexandra Eames helps SVU investigate.

programme.desc: While Fin deals with colleagues who accuse his son of murder, he learns a secret that reveals more about his family's relationship with Darius.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man (Chris "Ludacris" Bridges) connected to Fin's son goes on trial for the murders of a woman and her baby.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a polygamist's wife is murdered, he fears his testimony in a separate case may have led to her death; a Web site exposes potential witnesses.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a disabled woman is beaten and raped, Benson and Stabler think someone close to the victim is responsible.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 4-year-old student makes claims of sexual abuse against a singing coach and popular TV personality (Billy Porter).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A columnist who has been given access to the squad for a story declares a hate crime case a hoax, leaving the victim under media scrutiny and Benson fighting to get the case back on solid ground.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fin investigates a man's claim that his sister was gang raped.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi asks the SVU for help with a murder investigation when one of the witnesses shows signs of abuse.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A recently released convict goes looking for his arresting officer, Fin Tutuola; Carisi tries to get an arrest warrant without a positive suspect ID.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler run into multiple dead ends while investigating the case of a woman who fell to her death wearing only a slip.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a popular teen is sexually assaulted, Benson and Stabler delve into a modeling underworld of thoughtless parents, drug-dealing doctors and a trendy agency executive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler believe a fellow cop may be behind murders going back 30 years; Munch is in rare form during a child molestation case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler believe a pedophile (John Dossett) may be behind the murder of a travel writer, especially after meeting the victim's landlady and her streetwise daughter (Patricia Richardson, Lynn Collins).

programme.desc: Benson and Stabler suspect a pair of college basketball players of murdering a female student, but officials don't want to draw negative attention to the school.

programme.desc: The state pursues a media-sensationalized case against a known pedophile who's suspected of assaulting and killing a youth.
